includedAssets.title: Unreal City
includedAssets.synopsis: It's Armageddon as Michael Bay's action drama returns. The survival of humanity hangs in the balance as Chandler and the Nathan James crew face a new enemy.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The survival of humanity hangs in the balance as Chandler and the Nathan James crew face a new enemy.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: It's Armageddon as Michael Bay's action drama returns. The survival of humanity hangs in the balance as Chandler and the Nathan James crew face a new enemy.

includedAssets.title: Fight The Ship
includedAssets.synopsis: Slattery and the crew of Nathan James face a race against time to regain control of their ship while Chandler leads his fractured team in battle.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Slattery and the crew of Nathan James face a race against time to regain control of their ship while Chandler leads his fractured team in battle.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Slattery and the crew of Nathan James face a race against time to regain control of their ship while Chandler leads his fractured team in battle.

includedAssets.title: It's Not A Rumor
includedAssets.altTitle: S2, Ep3 - It's Not A Rumor
includedAssets.synopsis: Chandler is reunited with his family as the Nathan James returns home and the crew go in search of their loved ones. Will any of them return?
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Chandler is reunited with his family as the Nathan James returns home and the crew go in search of their loved ones. Will any of them return?
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Chandler is reunited with his family as the Nathan James returns home and the crew go in search of their loved ones. Will any of them return?

includedAssets.title: Solace
includedAssets.synopsis: Chandler sees the chance to add another ship to his fleet when the USNS Solace sails out to sea to wait for Dr Scott's cure.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Chandler sees the chance to add another ship to his fleet when the USNS Solace sails out to sea to wait for Dr Scott's cure.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Chandler sees the chance to add another ship to his fleet when the USNS Solace sails out to sea to wait for Dr Scott's cure.

includedAssets.title: Achilles
includedAssets.synopsis: Chandler and his crew go head-to-head with a nuclear-powered submarine. Slattery uncovers shocking news as he interrogates a mercenary from the hospital ship.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Chandler and his crew go head-to-head with a nuclear-powered submarine.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Chandler and his crew go head-to-head with a nuclear-powered submarine. Slattery uncovers shocking news as he interrogates a mercenary from the hospital ship.

includedAssets.title: Long Day's Journey
includedAssets.synopsis: Michael Bay's post-apocalyptic drama tools up. As Chandler prepares to face the `Immunes', Dr. Scott stumbles on a vital new clue in the hunt for a cure.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: As Chandler prepares to face the `Immunes', Dr. Scott stumbles on a vital new clue in the hunt for a cure.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Michael Bay's post-apocalyptic drama tools up. As Chandler prepares to face the `Immunes', Dr. Scott stumbles on a vital new clue in the hunt for a cure.

includedAssets.title: Alone And Unafraid
includedAssets.synopsis: As Chandler closes in on Sean's inner circle, he discovers it contains a surprising member. Meanwhile, XO Slattery struggles to evade the submarine.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: As Chandler closes in on Sean's inner circle, he discovers it contains a surprising member. Meanwhile, XO Slattery struggles to evade the submarine.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: As Chandler closes in on Sean's inner circle, he discovers it contains a surprising member. Meanwhile, XO Slattery struggles to evade the submarine.

includedAssets.title: Safe Zone
includedAssets.synopsis: Chandler works to reverse the brainwashing inflicted on Jeffrey Michener. Meanwhile, the arrival of her arch enemy aboard adds to Rachel's struggles.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Chandler works to reverse the brainwashing inflicted on Jeffrey Michener. Meanwhile, the arrival of her arch enemy aboard adds to Rachel's struggles.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Chandler works to reverse the brainwashing inflicted on Jeffrey Michener. Meanwhile, the arrival of her arch enemy aboard adds to Rachel's struggles.

includedAssets.title: Uneasy Lies The Head
includedAssets.altTitle: S2, Ep9 - Uneasy Lies The Head
includedAssets.synopsis: Chandler's team run into trouble as they hunt for supplies. Rachel's efforts to create a cure come to depend on Niels: the scientist who nearly erased mankind.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Chandler's team run into trouble as they hunt for supplies. Rachel's efforts to create a cure come to depend on Niels.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Chandler's team run into trouble as they hunt for supplies. Rachel's efforts to create a cure come to depend on Niels: the scientist who nearly erased mankind.

includedAssets.title: Friendly Fire
includedAssets.synopsis: Chandler launches a murder investigation following a suspicious death onboard. A terrifying surprise awaits the USS Nathan James when it arrives in New Orleans.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Chandler launches a murder investigation following a death onboard. A terrifying surprise awaits the USS Nathan James when it arrives in New Orleans.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Chandler launches a murder investigation following a suspicious death onboard. A terrifying surprise awaits the USS Nathan James when it arrives in New Orleans.

includedAssets.title: Valkyrie
includedAssets.synopsis: A bloody battle breaks out after the Nathan James locates the source of the Immunes' signal to an oil platform in the middle of the sea.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: A bloody battle breaks out after the Nathan James locates the source of the Immunes' signal to an oil platform in the middle of the sea.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: A bloody battle breaks out after the Nathan James locates the source of the Immunes' signal to an oil platform in the middle of the sea.

includedAssets.title: Cry Havoc
includedAssets.synopsis: Knowing they are headed for a final showdown with the submarine, Chandler sends Dr Scott off the ship. It falls to XO Slattery to protect both her and the cure.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Knowing they are headed for a final showdown with the submarine, Chandler sends Dr Scott off the ship.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Knowing they are headed for a final showdown with the submarine, Chandler sends Dr Scott off the ship. It falls to XO Slattery to protect both her and the cure.

includedAssets.title: A More Perfect Union
includedAssets.altTitle: S2, Ep13 - A More Perfect Union
includedAssets.synopsis: The Nathan James makes plans to dispense the cure. But with Immune factions still at large, more danger looms. Can the crew save the population? Season finale.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The Nathan James makes plans to dispense the cure. But with Immune factions still at large, more danger looms. Can the crew save the population?
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The Nathan James makes plans to dispense the cure. But with Immune factions still at large, more danger looms. Can the crew save the population? Season finale.

includedAssets.title: Season 2
includedAssets.synopsis: As the Nathan James returns to the US, the crew must battle to regain control of their ship before facing up to a new threat much closer to home. Second season of the action drama.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: As the Nathan James returns to the US, the crew fight to regain control of the ship and face a threat closer to home. Season two of the action drama.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: As the Nathan James returns to the US, the crew must battle to regain control of their ship before facing up to a new threat much closer to home. Second season of the action drama.

includedIn.title: The Last Ship
includedIn.synopsis: When a global pandemic wipes out most of the world’s population, the crew of an unaffected naval destroyer must find a way to stop the virus and save what remains of humanity.
includedIn.shortSynopsis: When a global pandemic wipes out most of the population, the crew of an unaffected naval destroyer must stop the virus and save humanity.
includedIn.mediumSynopsis: When a global pandemic wipes out most of the world’s population, the crew of an unaffected naval destroyer must find a way to stop the virus and save what remains of humanity.

title: The Last Ship Season 2
synopsis: As the Nathan James returns to the US, the crew must battle to regain control of their ship before facing up to a new threat much closer to home. Second season of the action drama.
